resources.string: Enables Lumen Workplace to display upcoming meetings
Lumen Workplace requires a few permissions before proceeding
I am using Lumen Workplace as my new meeting app and I think you\'d find it useful. Check it out - https://yourlumenworkplace.com
I am using #Lumen Workplace as my new meeting app and I think you\'d find it useful. Check it out - https://yourlumenworkplace.com
This version of Lumen Workplace is below the minimum supported version and may cause issues. Please update your app for the best experience.
